website_summaries.verdict: This electric Masterbuilt is a solid model that eliminates the need for propane or charcoal.
pros: Window allows you to watch your food while it cooks
LED light for reading cooking temperatures and timing is easy to read
cons: The windowed units are more prone to losing heat

customer_reviews.title: NO HAPPY ATM!
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE - Purchased this April 27, 2018 and it arrived Wed May 2nd. Box was a little beat up. Opened and tried using over the weekend and it did not work. It would heat up but not hold the temp then stopped heating all together. Messed around the whole weekend and then decided to return it. I contacted Amazon on Sat May 12th after I got home from traveling all week for work. THE ITEM IS NOT ELIGIBLE FOR RETURN!!! Seriously... BEWARE if you purchase this as you cannot return it. I live in Chicago so it isn't international either... NO HAPPY ATM!!! I was able to return the unused cover and wood chips...
customer_reviews.author: FABES

customer_reviews.title: Only worked four times
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this smoker as a Christmas gift in 2017. After using the smoker three times, the temperature probe stopped working. After using the smoker once more, the control panel stopped working and became unreadable. We sent emails and pictures to Masterbuilt asking for replacement parts. After a month, they emailed back and said that we had to order the parts and pay for them ourselves because it was not covered under the warranty. We have a $300 smoker that we can't use. We wish that we had read all the reviews as this seems to be an ongoing problem with this smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Wike

customer_reviews.title: Year or two before it will stop working
customer_reviews.text: Electrical issues after 18 months. No returns, No warranty, No smoker. (Actually the warranty is like 2 months, but come on...) Just like thousands of other people, I had the heating element go bad - Google "masterbuilt smoker repair" and you see what I mean. When this thing works, it's nice, but expect that you'll only get a year or two before it breaks, and that's assuming that you keep it covered and out of the elements. This thing is made in China and the only thing done in the US is take Warranty Support calls.
customer_reviews.author: Customer Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: fun !
customer_reviews.text: NICE SMOKER,, our first test was turning a bunch of dear meat into jerky ,, turned out fantastic and much to my amazement the trays and racks cleaned up quite easily as well,,,, great way to hang out together and socialize while smoking meat !,,, thanks
customer_reviews.author: bolisab

customer_reviews.title: Missing part and can't seem to get the part.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in January and there was a part missing. Have contacted Masterbuilt twice and each time they say it will be another month until they get the part. Don't know if we will like this or not because we can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: pas266

customer_reviews.title: Worked well...but very shoddy welding defeats the experience.
customer_reviews.text: Works just as described. A lazy man's smoker. Assembly and cleanup is easy. Get your own thermometer as the one on the display is not accurate. The cylinder to add the wood chips was sloppily welded, so has come off due to the bad weld job. I will have to weld it back on. Pretty annoying to see certain places on product were made shoddy on an otherwise solid product. The metal slide that holds the water bowl also came off due to the bad weld job. I have not used this product for months because of these two defects.
customer_reviews.author: BlackDragon

customer_reviews.title: I thought I bought a lemon until...
customer_reviews.text: I thought I bought a lemon until I saw how many lemons there were out there. The main complaints are about temperature issues with this smoker. Mine never kept accurate temperature and typically ran 50 to 60 degrees under what the readout said. Please see video proof. They sent a new control panel but it's still not working right. All three briskets I did had to be finished in the crock pot because it wouldn't go above 155 degrees. A few times it just shut itself off for no reason. Dadgum horrible product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore G.

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Last Long
customer_reviews.text: Delivered Apr 18, 2019, and today is July 7, 2019 that's 80 days . I had also got the weather cover to keep it from the weather, I had a family gathering to go to was going to smoke up some pork, and the smoker was dead, I tried different plug ins, and I made sure the outlet worked, and it was the smoker. This is the 2nd time I bought one of these, and I had the same problem with the other, so I can not recommend this to anyone, save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Dean

customer_reviews.title: Failed after only 5 uses
customer_reviews.text: They may have corrected this issue, but the model 20075315 40 inch electric smoker serial number BK091549 has a known issue with the Power Circuit Board. And their customer service as of today is terrible. I say that since I have spent three hours trying to get through to customer service. I've traded eMails with someone there, but they told me if I couldn't get through to CS to go to an appliance supply company where I could but the part for $40 more than Masterbuilt charges.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Eifling

customer_reviews.title: Air-tight and well insulated
customer_reviews.text: Great smoker. Arrived via UPS in good condition. Well packed in thick cardboard with Styrofoam packing on top, bottom and all 4 corners. Clear instructions on the minor assembly required. All parts were well packed with no damages. I couldn't wait to use it so I first smoked a 6lb. pork loin for 6 hours with outside temperatures in the low teens. Worked great, tasted excellent!! No leaking smoke around the door and seems to be completely air-tight. Temperature remained steady even in the cold outside temps. and gusty wind. I have since smoked salmon fillets, potatoes, assorted vegetables and bacon wrapped chicken. Love this smoker!!
customer_reviews.author: conric

customer_reviews.title: Keep warm doesn’t work in cold temps....
customer_reviews.text: So this smoker is awesome - 90% of the time.... I discovered this morning after owning for about a full year and half that if you try and stay it up when it’s cold outside it won’t work. I guess the temp prob has to be over 32F to allow it to work. After dragging it from the deck to the kitchen where I used a lighter to heat up the probe everything started working again. Some forums suggest using a hair dryer well it’s 430 in the morning now and I didn’t wanna wake my whole house up haha. So be aware of the cold temp EAA1 error!
customer_reviews.author: Phipps13

customer_reviews.title: PoorlyBuilt
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine, except for peeling paint. Then stopped working Christmas Day with dinner inside.. and a large group gathered. I finished cooking it in an already crowded oven and house. It was just past warranty, so I am in the process of fixing it myself.. not the heating element or control panel.. it seems to be the heat sensor. This will require breaking the rivets. But.. just worked out a great way to smoke using my Weber Grill. I won’t be buying from Masterbuilt again.. cheap, and not built to last. PoorlyBuilt.. better name.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L.

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this smoker. It was easy to use, consistent temp and results. A few months ago the control panel started to delaminate. It’s now completely come off. I went to use last night and now it won’t even turn on. This thing just didn’t last and I don’t have the money to buy disposable smokers.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I NEVER write a review on products I have purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: I NEVER write a review on products I have purchased, but this was so awful, I had to warn other buyers. I had this smoker for two weeks and the second time I used it, the control panel malfunctioned. I tried to use it a third time and the same result. I called masterbuilt and they informed me they had no parts available for this unit due to the fact it was made in 2011. I cannot believe a unit is sold without any parts available. If I could, I would rate this unit and Masterbuilt 0 stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: lance mulhern

customer_reviews.title: BEST BUY ON A HIGH QUALITY ELECTRIC SMOKER
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this smoker for my husband for christmas. We live in Connecticut, so we were not able to use it until this past weekend with the temperature hit the 40's. This thing is awesome. All of the interior parts are dishwasher safe. It worked perfectly. We smoked an 8 pound pork shoulder and it was just perfect. The temperature held steady at 245 even in cold weather. I would HIGHLY recommend this product to anyone looking to try electric smoking. It performed far better than I expected. The price is a BARGAIN. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vegan Trigger Machine
customer_reviews.text: This smokes a great brisket. I use it every weekend. Mostly because my neighbors are vegan. I'm now fat, but at least I'm happy and my neighbors are looking to move. Look for my upcoming review on fitness equipment.
customer_reviews.author: mizzouXC

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic. The only downside for me is that the ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. The only downside for me is that the heating element stopped working after a couple months. After talking to customer service they sent the replacement part and it only took a couple days to get here which was nice. After installing the heating element it worked perfectly! Thanks you for the excellent customer service Masterbuilt and because of that you get five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Louis Lowther

customer_reviews.title: Excellent - Good Luck on Shipping
customer_reviews.text: We cannot say enough great things about this product. My wife is a gourmet cook and she has so much fun with this unit. However, since Amazon cheaped out on shipping, the service has suffered. I found this unit on my front porch with a 4 inch gash on the bottom corner. It had been dropped and the side of the gash split. The unit itself was exposed through the gash and the housing was bent. Fortunately I could a assemble the unit and it's interior was not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: John Pittaway

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for the price, good quality and heat isolated, the remote control is a very appreciated plus, in the cons ,the heat distribution is irregular, hotter in the bottom and colder in the top so if you are smoking the same kind of food you have the risk to have uncooked food in the top and charred ones in the bottom, at the end I have to open the smoker and rotates the position of the grills, so heat is lost for a while. Option to celsius degree is absent it would be nice for future models.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique

customer_reviews.title: It works great  & easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assy & all necessary hardware was there. I wrapped the drip tray and bottom tray in aluminum foil as suggested by others and it worked great. The temp remains fairly consistent. So far I've done a pork butt, ribs & a large chicken and all turned out great. Very easy to setup if you get the right smoker tray you don't have to bother checking until it's done. The racks are easy to clean & fit in the dishwasher...sprayed them with PAM before cooking. The bluetooth remote worked fine for me for at least 30'. I'm new to a smoker & this unit sure made it easy.
customer_reviews.author: Veda

customer_reviews.title: Window or not?
customer_reviews.text: I've used the smoker only once since I pretreated it. The window is not practical for actual use, not only due to the blockage of vision by smoke, but for cleaning as well. Unless you are the type of person who will definitely spend the time and effort to clean it thoroughly after each use, it's a waste of $100 for the window. I'm very impressed by the insulation, the volume of smoke and the intensity of heat.
customer_reviews.author: Peter N. Mickelson

customer_reviews.title: Great Company, Great Little Smoker
customer_reviews.text: Spendy unit, but it's well built and very solid. I bought this model because the liquid trap can be removed and emptied while the unit is operating. I like the digital controls. Packaging is top-notch and the smoker arrived in perfect condition. One of the racks was bent - bowed - about 3/4 inch. Masterbuilt sent a replacement without question and with quick delivery. I had to sit on hold for five minutes, but once I reached an agent, it was a pleasant experience. I don't know if these are "entry level" smokers or not, but they're great for a casual user like me. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: TinkerTop Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works, but...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd unit. First one died after about a year and a half. Thought it must have been a bad unit son i bought another one because I enjoyed using it. Well, the second unit just died on me and it isn't even 2 years old. No wonder the warranty is only 90 days. I would avoid this smoker.
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: Beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two of the smokers in the last four months the first one I waited too long to send back. The computer stopped working wouldn't keep temperature, time, anything it just completely crapped out . The next one I bought after taking it out of the box shipping container was fine but the door was bent and broke so bad it wouldn't shut.... I box it back up return it for refund... so please beware if you buy one of these I bought two in the last four months neither one of them will work ....
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the smoked meat.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. I got in spring time and I have been smoking everything from pork butt, to ribs, to chicken wings (bread them, smoke them, then fry them). I have seen some people talk about it failing but mine still works well and I have heard that masterbuilt really stands behind their product and will take care of you. Btw there is also an entire bbq group on Facebook dedicated to masterbuilt electric smokers and they are a good community too.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff D.

customer_reviews.title: needs handles
customer_reviews.text: works great, just wish it had handles. hard to move. can't use in garage and no place to leave it outside.
customer_reviews.author: sa

customer_reviews.title: BBQing Made Easy
customer_reviews.text: Have smoked ribs on two separate occasions, 6 slabs the first time and 4 slabs the second. Perfect outcome using the 3-2-1 recipe method. Placing, removing, and replacing the meat throughout the 3-2-1 process is a bit of a drill but I was much better at it the second time and sure I'll get better in the future. Used the remote which is a nice feature but so far have not been able to get the temperature setting to sync with the smoker's control setting...about 5 degrees difference. All other remote functions work fine. Love the space this smoker offers. Looking to try a big brisket next. Smoker was relatively easy to assemble and arrived in well-protecting packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Proud OG

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: One year old now and have used it 7-8 times at most. Most disappointing part is the control buttons literally “dry rotted” away. It was kept in the shade out of weather so hard to believe this is a high quality product. The functions still work but I am a bit frustrated that in 1 year it’s already breaking. Hope to hear back from masterbuilt to see what they will suggest/offer. Will update if I hear from them. The smoker itself is nice however!
customer_reviews.author: Aizrec!

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker and priced right.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first smoker and so far I have been impressed. Assembly went smooth but I would recommend you turn it upside down instead of on its side during the initial assembly. I went through the pre-season process, temperature held pretty constant for the three hours and smoke was emitting only from air damper. So unit is pretty tight. I am going to smoke some pork ribs this weekend and if I have any issues I will update. As of now I would recommend this as a buy.
customer_reviews.author: miker

customer_reviews.title: Decent in quality and build, low smoke output
customer_reviews.text: Temp gauge is off. But aftermarket thermometer will replace and be more accurate. It does hold temp fine, is well insulated, plenty of room inside, wish it steamed water a bit more and made more smoke. Not getting a lot of smoke throughout the smoking. But it works and is not bad for the money. Getting out of the propane world and going electric is definitely the way to go. Just have to figure out how to get more smoke. Also it claims you cannot use wood pellets. Unknown why but it’s says you can’t.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Cook and forget
customer_reviews.text: I'm an avid bbq guy, I have used charcoal (which I like) but it has to be monitored continuously. This is stuff and go, change the chips out ever couple of hours. I'm picky so it is a pain to clean after every use, but needs to be done. Some complain of fire, if you let grease build up and don't clean of course it will catch fire. I have placed Pork shoulders in the smoker at 1:00 A:M and by noon the next day, good to go.
customer_reviews.author: KYfisherman

customer_reviews.title: this thing is amazing! but.....
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS!!! THING I USE THE HELL OUT OF IT!! THE ONLY downside is that it got rained on one night and the plastic cover over the control panel peeled right off exposing the buttons. and electronics. big con: this can not! be left out in weather! other con is that you have to add wood chips every 20-30 minutes. other than that i love this thing people rave about my cooking now.. people get into fights for trying my leftovers at lunch break at work.
customer_reviews.author: A Honest Review

customer_reviews.title: Perfect smoker
customer_reviews.text: This smoker is great. It is so automatic on everything that I set it and forget about it. I have to add wood chips about every 4 hours. There is an easy place to do that. Just some tips, don't overfill the water pan. Grease drips in there so it is easily overflowed. There is a second drop pan to catch the overflow. The first time you smoke it really seasons the smoker but the meat will be barely smoked. After the first time the smoker is ready and does a great job. I have smoked meats for several years and this does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: John T. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker. Easy to put together. Great options.
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy to put together, just a half dozen pieces to screw into place. The remote works great. Held temps for 8 hours without a single adjustment, even in 20 degree PA temps. The side panel wood chip loader is a great addition. The internal light is pretty useless as its too full of smoke and stuff to see in. Same with window, but its built like a little submarine with its door so no heat escapes through it. This is my 3rd smoker and hands down is the nicest one Ive owned.
customer_reviews.author: Aenaey

customer_reviews.title: A great digital smoker, but the remote is an unnecessary liability
customer_reviews.text: This smoker has a lot of room in it, usually more than you need for all but the largest parties. Adding chips is a breeze, and the digital top controls work well. Results are great. The remote is another story--if you don't push the buttons in exactly the right order, or if you program using the digital top controls then try to alter the program with the remote, the heating element can turn on and then not shut off until the smoker overheats. I had this happen twice before I gave up on the remote and just shifted to using the controls on the top.
customer_reviews.author: D. Richards

customer_reviews.title: Great when it worked!
customer_reviews.text: It worked great when it worked - the remote never worked properly. I smoked an amazing turkey, a Boston Butt, and made it halfway through a brisket when it dies. It would just turn off randomly and display Error one. My research on the internet suggested that it had something to do with extremely low temps and the probe, but it was 59 degrees. I couldn’t get it working, so I returned it and ordered the Bluetooth model. I don’t know that it will work any better, but giving Masterbuilt another shot.
customer_reviews.author: Scamutz

customer_reviews.title: Great Smoker for 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Used smoker for 2 years and worked great up until today the smoker stopped heating. Now I will try and check the element and other obvious things. I used it about once every other weekend and on Thanksgiving. Wished it would of lasted a little longer than just two years. Will update if I find anything new about it other than that it is dead right now. I blame it on cheap imported parts. Going to give it a 2 star rating for 2 years of solid minimal service. Will update with the findings or if it can be repaired and how easy it can be repaired.
customer_reviews.author: ecityweb

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this smoker!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my husband and was so happy when he told me this is the BEST birthday gift he EVER received! He loves loves it, and every weekend he treats us to something new off the smoker! I took my time researching smokers, electric, propane, size, etc. and this still stays my favorite. I think he really likes that it's electric so we don't have to worry with gas bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great smoker, I’ve used them for years. I bought this for my dad for Christmas. Got it put together and a piece Of “shelving” for lack of better terms was bent so the water pan wouldn’t fit in it. Bent it back and noticed the tack welds are not good at all... online customer service is pretty crappy... luckily we live close to Master Built and they shipped out the replacement after a phone call.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Boswell

customer_reviews.title: Abosolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first electric smoker and now I want to smoke everything! I did by a separate thermostat as "recommended" before checking out; however returned it after realizing this came with a probe and remote. The cover is well worth the price and fits perfect. Have since used aluminum foil on the drip catcher for easy clean-up. Works great, family loves the food, highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: A.K.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality - broken support web site too
customer_reviews.text: I've used this smoker twice. One of the welds broke off the drip pan rails that holds the water pan and the remote control has stopped working (yes, I've tried new batteries - 3 sets). The Masterbuilt web site gives you only 300 chars to describe the problem and they want you to attach pictures of the problems and the sticker with the serial number - but the site fails to upload the photos every time. Of course, it's Christmas Eve so I'm going to have to wait and try to call them on Monday. We'll see if their customer service is any better than their web support.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Used four times since delivered 4wks ago. I use have to use additional temp probes because the MES sensors and probe are not accurate. The Included meat probe went bad (stuck at 310°) the third use but they quickly sent a new one and it seems more accurate than the first but still 8°-10°s off. For food safety reasons you would think the included probe and smoke chamber temperature sensors would be better. I got a smoke generator because the chip try is so tiny. So far it just requires a bit more attention because the temperature inaccuracy makes the remote useless to monitor the temps. Once I can afford better I will buy a different brand for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Redjar

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend to anyone and it is very easy to smoke ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I have smoked ribs, a pork butt, and chicken. I almost wish I purchased the 40" to fit ribs and brisket without cutting them in half to fit on the grates. Also, the built-in meat probe is sketchy and I would suggest buying a legit one to make sure your meats are cooked to the correct internal temperature. I would recommend to anyone and it is very easy to smoke the food you want.
customer_reviews.author: Arvin C.

customer_reviews.title: Typical quality but it works
customer_reviews.text: Love/hate thing here. It works well but if it could be made any cheaper, it would be. The electronics are garbage. You can use the remote or use the control panel. You can't use both. The temperature always starts at the lowest setting and you need to up arrow it all the way to where you want it one degree at a time. Stupid. The remote is about worthless due to range and function. But, it maintains temperature and smokes food.
customer_reviews.author: PghHLT

customer_reviews.title: More of a steamer than a smoker
customer_reviews.text: Had this product for over six months now and I'm sad to say that every time I used it, I got a bad result. I get way better results using a regular propane grill than using this. I received it with one the drip tray latch broken as well, the ashtray doesn't slide in or out smoothly. don't bother buying this product, keep in mind that it took me six months to write this is because every time it came out wrong I tell myself "maybe I did something wrong, I'll try something different next time" over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Mohamed

customer_reviews.title: Short lived love affair
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking appliance and I had no problem leaving it on the porch. I didn't feel like after I used it, that I had to hide it in the garage. Loved the convenience of the electric smoker. Loved the brisket, ribs, and chicken that I smoked in it. However, this was a short lived love affair. I used the smoker twice and then it broke. After second use, the back panel with the handle broke away from the body of the smoker. I returned for a refund. Such a shame, because it is a good looking and adequate smoker. Just not well built.
customer_reviews.author: BlueScissors

customer_reviews.title: Great smokers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and they loved it. I have an older model and also love it. There are tricks to learn along the way to get the smoke flavor you want. If you want a bit more smoke flavor put your meat on when you start the smoker. The element burns the chips if your smoker is at temp you don't get much smoke. There are tons of little tricks to learn but a great way to start learning to smoke your favorite foods.
customer_reviews.author: JDP

customer_reviews.title: EASY!
customer_reviews.text: Ok. So you couldn't smoke a chicken or beef if you got spotted the s-m-o-k. Well, you can now. This thing works great. I have traditionally smoked meat on a big smoker with tons of wood and babysitting, only to have problems managing the pit temp. All that is removed by purchasing this smoker from Masterbuilt. This thing is awesome. I won my first one in a silent auction, not expecting to win it or really wanting it. I decided on a whim to keep it and, man o' manischevitz, it works well. I'm posting this as I just bought a new one since I wore the other one out! Don't delay.
customer_reviews.author: bigman

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY From Masterbuilt
customer_reviews.text: We spent almost $400 for a smoker that we used maybe 10 times. Right from the get go the temperature was off so we could not rely on it and decided to use a meat thermometer. It went down from there and on the morning of having guests over it would not even go on. We called Masterbuilt and they will not fix or send part because we are over the warranty. It was only returnable for 30 days. We had a case number and contact with them but they would rarely answer correspondence. We entertain often and will definitely will buy a new smoker but never again a Masterbuilt.
customer_reviews.author: barbinashburn

customer_reviews.title: Poor engineering
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our Char Broil with this smoker. 1st run to season ERROR CODE code, called Masterbuilt and they said box sensor not designed to work when outside temp is below 40 degrees. Many articles on this if you google it. So I warmed the box and probe with a hair dryer. Waste of $200 in my eyes, what a hassle, poor design/engineering. Additionally remote works about 10 feet vice the 100 feet it boasts. Do not recommend this smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Tuvell

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend for Christmas and he loves it! In my opinion I’m getting a little sick of every meat that we eat be smoked, but that’s just my opinion! No issues with machine so far, recommend to purchase the cover made for it for weather proofing. He likes the fact that there’s a glass window on the door so he can view in. Works great, meat tastes great, all around great!
customer_reviews.author: Ray Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to use and is fun to try new things with. We got a separate thermometer due to the one being built in is not the greatest. It is a great size and gets put away easily. We asked around a lot before getting it and were very pleased. This was the most recommended. Be sure to get chips and not pellets. Big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: SMOKIN HOT !
customer_reviews.text: Very well packaged, excellent quality, the temperature probe, window, and light, are all great features to help achieve perfection. It easily holds the set temperature in Michigan winter weather. It's been a pleasure to use while making some of the best smoked fish and chicken my family has ever eaten. I smoked salmon at 200 degrees for about 1 hour, when the temperature probe indicated an internal temperature of 140 degrees it was done to perfection like . I'm hooked, it looks like I will need to spend more time fishing. ooh well.
customer_reviews.author: REALITY  CHECK.

customer_reviews.title: Should've bought one years ago
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. The thermometer is not accurate so don't go by it when checking the meats internal temp could be under cooked or you could overcook it if not careful. I use this smoke at least once or twice a week. Some of the manufacturers of wood will flame up but I read it's the tray on the heating coil but I think it's the wood because other manufacturers doesn't flame up.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: No power right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Received my smoker, assembled as directed which there are no power parts that need assembling so not user error involved. Plugged it in and no power. Tried to call Customer Service, and they are only Monday-Friday Business hours. Now, what days is it most people cook out and might need assistance? AMAZINGLY POOR SERVICE to whomever made that business decision. Guess I'll be boxing it back up for return! 4-5 hours of my life gone I can never get back! /sigh
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: everything has turned out amazing. At first I thought the window would be ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for Fathers Day, with at least 20 uses so far, everything has turned out amazing. At first I thought the window would be an issue for temperature control but this unit keeps a controlled and accurate temp. The glass also allows me to keep a close eye on my food, not needing to open the door helps hold in the smoke and avoid temperature fluctuations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this twice so far since I got it, but I love it. I made pork ribs and they turned out perfectly. It is so much easier to use that my old gas smoker, I can just set the temperature and forget it. The only downside is that is sets too low to the ground, and difficult to empty the grease drip pan. I am going to build a stand for it to get it up higher, which will make it a little more user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Born

customer_reviews.title: Happy so far
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased the product and I have used it several times with great results. Minimal assembly required and easy to use. I read the reviews concerning the longevity of the heating element so I bought the extended warranty for about 40 bucks for four years You might want to add the cold smoker sidebox assessory for about $60 To smoke cheese and fish. Also it creates about three or four hours of smoke where you don’t have to fill the chip holder on the unit every hour. It also smokes pellets good as well
customer_reviews.author: Dr J

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: Truth be told- I had an awesome time using this, up until about the third or fourth time I attempted to power this on, which it wouldn't do. I tried to mess with outlets and plugs with no satisfaction- nor did I have any satisfaction emailing the company six times, or Amazon 3 times, neither of which provided any significant help about fixing any problems. You'll get stuck with a non functional unit and no support lines. Buy for a handful of good uses and then a gaggle of troubles.
customer_reviews.author: gift card recipient

customer_reviews.title: Nice going Masterbuilt
customer_reviews.text: Used if about 5 times over a year since buying it. Controller won't turn on now, replacement controller is $100. Read the other complaints about this unit and they all say the controller goes and the pert is too expensive to replace. Masterbuilt only provides a 90 day warranty, for obvious reasons. I don't know how the people that work or sell this unit sleep at night. Nice going Masterbuilt, putting a product on the market you know will fail.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes wonderful smoked food!
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from a smaller windowless Masterbuilt smoker that I've had for years. This enticed me with the window and built in meat thermometer. I've used this smoke for about 4 months now and am very pleased. The wood chips are easy to insert during the smoking. Mine seems to burn a cup of chips every hour to hour and a half. There is SO much room with the 4 racks and wider body. Make sure you watch the videos online to learn how to clean it safely (hot water and apple cider vinegar, with a sponge). The temperature gauge at the top is hard to read in the sunlight but overall this is a great smoker!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Very good and easy to assemble and to use product.
customer_reviews.text: Very good and easy to assemble and to use product. Took me about 35 minutes to assemble. Easy to follow instructions. Make sure you cure it following the instructions before using it for real, that way you will ensure the smoker will work fine and the interior will have the necessary "smoke coat" to work well. My first smoke were some Spanish Longaniza sausage. They came out very good and I am very pleased. The second smoke were two wild hog hams. They were delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Ochillee

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous product
customer_reviews.text: Best smoker around for ease of use. I have had the smaller one for some time and finally upgraded. Having the wider shelves is a huge benefit and the smoke production in this unit has been excellent. There are a lot of people that feel electric smokers are not "real" and it is a difference but for the convenience and capability especially on days where I can't be sitting out with a beer for hours, this is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Reely

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker.  Buy it , use it & savor the flavor
customer_reviews.text: What a great smoker. I put off purchasing a smoker for years, but when I finally went shopping, I knew what I wanted. Electric heat, digital thermostat, insulated walls, meat probe and the ability to add wood chips from the outside. When the package arrived, I was impressed by the build quality. It was easy to assemble, operate & season. My first batch of smoked ham, corn & bacon wrapped chicken was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: George Dean

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, delicious results.
customer_reviews.text: This smoker is an absolute quality item. We have smoked every type of meat in it and the results have been amazing. We are now trying different types of wood including apple and chipped whiskey barrels. It is easy to use and the remote is very handy. The built in temperature probe is accurate and a great feature. We are anticipating many more delicious meals from this smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Herman P.

customer_reviews.title: Husband Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband as his birthday gift; so surprised when it arrived. He still thanks me every time he uses it because it's so easy to use, has a remote so he doesn't have to be on-top of it and works great. I looked at very similar ones at dept stores but even though it was the same maker it didn't have the same serial numbers nor the same great reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Buyers remorse after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: The controller is incredibly cheap...definately not built by a master. After 6 months the buttons on the smoker don't work. Power led doesn't come on. The remote sort of works. I set temp and time and it appears to start heating. The remote dosent display actual temp. The whole thing sometimes just shuts off...not good if you don't catch it. The glass doors were a mistake... they get pretty filthy. If I had to do it over...I wouldnt. Now I need to see what support is like not what you want to do for such an expensive product. When it was new it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Occasional Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Shipment arrived damaged, the bottom of the enclosure pushed in, Masterbuilt provided a new enclosure enabling me to assemble the "replacement" smoker with the undamaged parts. Easy instructions were provided and it works great. It is heartening when a company provides this level of service, besides providing a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Wrecks in 3D

customer_reviews.title: The smoker works fine. The controller is build so cheap and is ...
customer_reviews.text: The smoker works fine. The controller is build so cheap and is not working. I tried to get a working replacement controller but I wasn't able too. I will never again buy an item like this on Amazon. I prefer a store where I can walk in and get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: ute

customer_reviews.title: Love this smoker.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Masterbuilt Smoker we have owned and we have had great results with all of them. I like the glass front. That way I dont have to open the door and can see what is cooking. I haven't had any problems with heating elements or electronics. You may notice that your smoked items get better the more you use it. We always season first, but using just creates a wonderful smoke chamber. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Al Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for smoking fresh fish and he loves it. Does a good job of smoking to the degree needed. Be aware that like all smokers it emits smoke so it needs to be away from where you are socializing. Also the exterior gets hot so be careful with children. Works perfectly though and we have no regrets about purchasing it!
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Burthold

customer_reviews.title: Cooks delicious meat
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband. He's never owned a smoker before. It works great for a novice. It's easy to use and clean up. He enjoys the remote and monitoring the temperature from inside while the smoker is outside. We've used it several times now and have had no issues. The meat turns out tender and has a great flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Very Surprised
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this smoker, I had little confidence that it would be the quality product that it is! Every screw has a rugged mechanical connection, not sheet metal screws. The instructions are written in plain unbroken English accompanied with an accurate illustration. The break-in instructions were easy to follow. I have not smoked anything but I anticipate no problems when I do. The only downer I might have would be the lack of a few more recipes.
customer_reviews.author: PITA2wife

customer_reviews.title: Owned the unit for less that 6 months when the ...
customer_reviews.text: Owned the unit for less that 6 months when the plastic piece covering the control panel appeared to crack and fall off. This was with the unit under the matching cover whenever it was not in use. I assume this also caused water to somehow get into the panel when it was not in use as the control panel will no longer function properly, nor will the remote control. Masterbuilt support wants $50 for a new control panel for a product less than 6 moths old that did not hold up to standard usage.
customer_reviews.author: Jed

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my boyfriend. He loves it! It’s very easy to use, perfect for someone just getting in to smokers because it maintains a steady temp on its own. The window is great too, it keeps you from having to open the door prematurely if you’re impatient and want to peek.
customer_reviews.author: NurseM

customer_reviews.title: Heating element has a short live span
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. However, the heating element does not last for too long (mine last 18 month) and this company has an awful custom service. You cannot order online or by email. They want you to call and when I call, they put me on hold for over 40 minutes. I decided to buy a new smoker, of course from a different manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Juan M

customer_reviews.title: BAD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I am a very satisfied Amazon shopper and use them a lot. I have never returned anything until now. The Masterbuilt smoker is to be avoided. The smoking element does not produce consistent smoke, it trips our breakers with every use, it is obviously not well made. After getting my unit and trying to use it per the instructions, I read online reviews outside Amazon and discovered the issues I am encountering are being reported hundreds of times. DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME AND MONEY. This one is a no brainer. This is a review of the product, not Amazon. Amazon refunded my money and I am very happy with their service.
customer_reviews.author: SmittyWink

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away From Masterbuilt.
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Just like all the other reviews you have to dig deep for. Smoker wouldn't go higher than 180 degrees but panel would read 60 degrees higher. Wait for 6 hours for customer service to call back. They send me a new controller. A week later try again. Now it's only off by 30 degrees but after 5 hours the meat is already only good for the dog. $100 worth of brisket an ribs in the garbage the first time. Now 2 racks of venison for the dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Dan M

customer_reviews.title: he bought and love smoker. Family and friends love when I cook ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, have had masterbuilt 30"for 3 years now, never let me down. Had to buy 40" take 30" in camper every other weekend camping in fifth wheel camper. Smoker is the only way I cook when out camping, unless we do mountain pies over fire. Get lots of compliments about smell of food I cook. I even had a fellow camper take big interest in smoker ask lots of questions last year. Ran into him at same campground this year and ask I remembered him and I changed him, he bought and love smoker. Family and friends love when I cook in smoker
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: A near "set it and forget it" smoker. (Have to add chips 30-45 min) But this thing works like BUTTAH! 1) Smoked prime rib... AMAZING taste 2) Smoked stuffed mushrooms 3) Smoked Corned Beef brisket 4) Smoked Pork Shoulder Every time, they come out perfect. Holds a great temperature. Gets back to temp quick when opening to baste and mop. I would totally buy again!
customer_reviews.author: The Madd Hadder

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about an electric smoker, but decided to give it a try. I am glad I did. I've enjoyed mine now for several months and used it to smoke salmon, ribs, chicken, brisket, pork butt and shoulder. And recently smoked a turkey breast that my family crazy over. It takes a little practice to get the time and temperature right. I highly recommend getting a remote meat thermometer so you don't have to open it to check the temp. My mom just bought one for my brother for his birthday, and he is loving it.
customer_reviews.author: RB in CA

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: Before you buy please search online for "masterbuilt control unit issues" or "masterbuilt heating element issues" or "masterbuilt smoker not working". You may luck out and get a good unit, but you may be like the many of us who have issues. Customer Service was polite, but ultimately not helpful. Too many hoops and too many unsuccessful trials to get to a real resolution. You've been warned.
customer_reviews.author: the_mad_reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this November of 2018 and never took it out of the box. I finally got it out a couple weeks ago. I did the pre-seasoning and then went to smoke some lake trout at 165 degrees and the temp wouldn’t hold. It climbed all the way to 300 degrees. Registered my product explaining the issue and said I didn’t expect them to warranty it. I asked what it is I need to buy to fix it so I can use it. Only contact you can make with Masterbuilt is by email. They say someone will get with me in less then 5 days. It’s been 13. Terrible customer service. Going back to my Little Chief.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T.

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT EVEN LAST ONE YEAR!
customer_reviews.text: This did not even last one year. A few months ago it would only heat up to 200 degrees, we bought a new heating element and that did nothing. We had a smaller model before and it worked fine. This only has a 90 day warranty, if you do buy it I suggest you buy the extended warranty. Very disappointed, not even a year.
customer_reviews.author: Adaire

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Got the smoker as a gift from my daughter to my husband. We've only used it once, so far, and we did 2 racks of ribs, and a chicken... and they came out great.... So very easy to use! Just put in wood chips and turn it on... My husband is very happy... and so is my daughter 'cause she gets some smoked foods to take home!
customer_reviews.author: Bernice M.

customer_reviews.title: Faulty temperature readout and thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Received this smoker and since day one has not worked properly. Although the digital read-out states that is has reached the maximum temperature of 275 degrees, the actual internal temperature is between 160 and 170 degrees. This has been verified by a separate digital probe and analog thermometer. It does not matter what I do with it, it does not get very hot inside. The highest I have been able to get the internal temperature of the meats I have smoked is around 145 degrees.***Update** 08/23/18 After almost 6 weeks and 4 calls to Masterbuilt Customer Service, a replacement control panel is finally on the way. Will update this post once it is installed.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Peck

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic personal smoker
customer_reviews.text: So far, I've smoked ribs and a pork butt. Both turned out with a perfect smoke flavor and perfect doneness. I've had real wood smokers, and (with the exception of the egg) it is rather taxing to maintain temperature and sometimes the smoke flavor is too heavy. This snooker was "set it and forget it" almost literally. I added wood chips twice to an 8 HR smoke. The remote control is also extremely convenient. Only down side (even though rafting was not effected)... The window was/is pointless.
customer_reviews.author: arthur cowan

customer_reviews.title: Feelin Ripped Off
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter and her husband for Xmas. Warranty expired before they even used it. Winter weather was the reason for not using until April. Didn't work from the start, unit keep shutting off and the digital display was half blank. I didn't realize it only had a 90 day warranty or I wouldn't have bought this. 1st use failure, for $200.00 plus. I don't recommend anyone purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ott

customer_reviews.title: It is actually larger than I needed so I probably could have been satisfied with the smaller unit
customer_reviews.text: I have been smoking meats every weekend since I received this. It is actually larger than I needed so I probably could have been satisfied with the smaller unit. Heats pretty quickly and changing the wood chips is simple. I've used the thermometer and it works quite well - haven't tried the remote yet. Temperature keeps pretty steady. Just waiting for someone to invent a side wood chip autoloader! EDIT: Oh there is a side chip loader. That's next on my list.
customer_reviews.author: 360sunnydays

customer_reviews.title: Great Smoker.
customer_reviews.text: I researched the heck out of electric smokers before I made this purchase. I smoke using an indirect heat wood smoker as well. This unit is spot on. The remote made the process was so much less tedious. The chips worked great. I smoked with several types of wood chips, and the results were excellent . I do caution against using too much water in the pan, in that humidity does not burn off nearly as fast in an enclosed smoker as that of a wood fired unit. This is a super unit. I have the glass front, no biggy, It does get rather obsecured by smoke,, but adequate for viewing the progress without losing heat.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gutmann

customer_reviews.title: My first smoker
customer_reviews.text: This was really a great buy for me. This unit is really easy to use. I have cooked boneless and bone in chicken breast, ribs and a small brisket. The best where chicken wings. Super easy to use and the wireless controller makes it really easy to keep an eye on the tempeture of the meat. I smokeed the ribs for 1-1/2 hours then wrapped them in foil, put them on non direct heat for another hour on a gas grill and they where perfectly cooked.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Overall I've had really good and consistent results with this smoker and it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall I've had really good and consistent results with this smoker and it was a good value, the only issue I have is with the wood feeder, it's pretty flimsy and has to be handled with care and the remote temperature checker is a bit hit or miss on operating, but people were very pleased with the meat that has come off of it.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Kuharik

customer_reviews.title: This is a great smoker if you live in an apartment
customer_reviews.text: This is a great smoker if you live in an apartment. It's easy to clean and does it's job. However I recommend a lot of moisture when smoking. The skin on some things like chicken, can become tough and rubbery, but the meat it absolutely splendid.
customer_reviews.author: L.M. Ash

customer_reviews.title: The smoker was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The smoker was easy to assemble. The instructions are clear with substantial pictures "Product A" (wood chip tray) goes here.." etc. This being said, I wish it came with a few basic "starter" recipes. The internet has so many opinions and personal recipes, I wasn't sure how long to smoke my chicken. I would also appreciate a "preheat" time......That can be confusing...Does the cooking time start when it reaches ___? How long should I allow - there's no "beep!" Overall, I am satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B Hughley

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well for 7 months then cratered. Will not buy again, Might consider another brand. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Howard

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Works as advertised, easy to assemble, food comes out great. Cons: Quality of material, workmanship and final QC in line with far east standards. Unit came in factory box only (Amazon please double box while original box does not provide enough protection)! Assembled easy and after initial cleaning and seasoning was off to producing some good food. Cleaning was fairly easy, unit operation was pretty straight forward. One thing would make this a 5 star product is manufacturing using quality materials and taking more care while assembling. Unit has performed fine, I'm worried about longevity while it really looks and feels like something manufactured far east! Final rating 3 1/2 stars in regards to mentioned above!
customer_reviews.author: lejlah88

customer_reviews.title: Returned after 5 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Returned after 5 weeks for a full refund.. Temperature all over the place, didn't want to deal with this thing. Only tried to use it twice was a nightmare... Buyer beware..........
customer_reviews.author: gary p

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this smoker, after years of using a simple smoker with no timer or temperature controls left him with dried over cooked meat. The temperature controls, timer, and size provide the right amount of control to produce great jerky, and smoked fish, etc. What he doesn't like the chip loader is too small.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: PATHETIC
customer_reviews.text: I bought this smoker and wasted my money.I did the seasoning and it seemed to be okay. When I went to smoke chicken breast and set the temperature to 250 it would not even go past 86 degrees.THAT was after 2hrs of warm up.I would not recommend this smoker to anyone. I will buy another smoker but will never buy this product again.Poor quality and very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Rice

customer_reviews.title: Damaged......and I don't know who to contact.  (BIG dent on the right side)
customer_reviews.text: My first smoker purchase. I received this item (via shipping) about a month prior to opening (waited for warmer weather). While unboxing, I noticed a 3" round indentation (very deep) on the right side (lower half, right in the center). I didn't know what to do....I still don't know what to do. I don't know who to contact. I have not used this smoker yet, but it is all put together....and it's not very pretty. All my friends and family keeps pointing out the big dent on the side. PHOTO's available upon request
customer_reviews.author: tkboggs

product_meta.title: Masterbuilt 20070411 30-Inch Top Controller Electric Smoker with Window and RF Controller
product_meta.description: Size:30 Inch| Style:Top Controller/Window| Color:Stainless steelBuilt-in viewing window with internal light for cooking at all times during the day or night. Industry first remote control with temperature and time monitoring capability makes slow smoking easier than ever. Push-button digital temperature and time control panel.
feature_bullets: 730 sq. inches of cooking space with Four chrome-coated smoking racks — smoke up to 100 lbs. of food
RF Remote controls and monitors temperature, time, internal light, on/off and meat temperature
Thermostat temperature control for even cooking from 100 to 275 degrees F and built-in meat temperature probe
Convenient side loading wood chips, removable drip pan and top air damper. Watch food cook with viewing window and internal light
Refer User manual for Installation Instructions (assembly and operation)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars2,299 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
